txt.en: Rangers in Bree-land are concerned over the appearance of a foe they have long fought in the north, the Tarkrîp Orcs. You should defeat them so that the Thornley family may once again be able to sleep at night.
A suitable amount of vengeance has been delivered to the Tarkrîp Orcs that captured and tortured Robb Thornley. Now it is time to seek the one called the Red Reaver.
Robb Thornley has been rescued from the Orcs, battered and beaten, but he is not satisfied with rescue. He wants retribution, particularly against the Orc they call the Red Reaver.
A suitable amount of vengeance has been delivered to the Tarkrîp Orcs that captured and tortured Robb Thornley. Now it is time to face the one called the Red Reaver.

Rangers in Bree-land are concerned over the appearance of a foe they have long fought in the north, the Tarkrîp Orcs. You have already slain many, but many yet remain. Robb Thornley could probably do with a little more vengeance.
'Have you done away with the Red Reaver? Robb will be so happy to hear that you've done away with that beast of an Orc! And I'll thank you too for making the Greenway a safer place.'
